summary: An in-depth look at the Democratic and Republican national conventions held during the 2008 U.S. Presidential election year.
cast: Richard Abramowitz|Stephen Baldwin|Annette Bening|Ellen Burstyn|Rachael Leigh Cook|David Crosby|Alan Cumming|Tim Daly|Charlie Daniels|Robert Davi|Dana Delany|Giancarlo Esposito|Tom Fontana|Danny Glover|Anne Hathaway|Spike Lee|Josh Lucas|Matthew Modine|Tom Morello|Gloria Reuben|Susan Sarandon|Richard Schiff|Ron Silver|Sting|Lynn Whitfield|Will.i.am
title: PoliWood
